boids.rules

Class RuleHuntBoids

  • java.lang.Object
    • boids.rules.Rule
      • boids.rules.RuleHuntBoids

  • public class RuleHuntBoids
extends Rule
    Represents a rule where a boid hunts the nearest prey boid. Useful to create a predator/prey environment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuleHuntBoids(BoidGroup flock, double distance)
      Constructor of the rule {flock, distance}.

    • Method Summary

      The application of a rule returns a boid acceleration.
